titles: The copy of a letter sent from the Cardinall du Perron embassadour for the French king at Rome concerning the divisions of the papists of England their difference in government whether by bishops or Jesuites with the care of His Holinesse in the agreement, and his judgement in placing of bishops in England for making priests to increase the Catholic number : whereunto is added a certaine conjecture of the use both prelates and papists have made of the cardinals counsell to augment and establish their greatnesse.
author: Du Perron, Jacques Davy, 1556-1618.
notes: Translation of part of a letter of 7 September 1605, extracted from the author's Ambassades et negotiations.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
